description.en:
ARIX token is a revenue-generating coin that allows parties to
transact business and receive revenues on the platform. Arix dex it’s internet DEX .The revenues will automatically be transmitted into ARIX token holders" accounts once the trade is concluded. In this regard,ARIX anticipates generating interest whenever a successful transaction takes place on the platform.
